SELECT ci.*, di.NAME AS firnitureName, di.images AS firnitureImages, di.portion, fti.NAME AS typeName, ui.NAME AS userName, ui.images AS userImages, mi.NAME AS merchantName, mi.images AS merchantImages from collect_info ci LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = ci.user_id ) LEFT JOIN dishes_info di ON ( di.id = ci.furniture_id ) LEFT JOIN merchant_info mi ON ( mi.id = ci.merchant_id ) LEFT JOIN firniture_type_info fti ON ( fti.id = di.type_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.userName},'%')
AND fti.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.typeName},'%')
AND di.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.firnitureName},'%')
ORDER BY ci.create_date DESC
